title: Eclipse Stainless Steel Sauce Spoon
description: Bolster your kitchen collection with this handy Eclipse 8" sauce spoon. Made from durable stainless steel, this versatile piece of cookware is sure to quickly become an irreplaceable addition to your home. Features a stylish, matte design that's sure to fit in with any modern kitchen. A side-pour spout makes serving quick, easy, and mess-free. Hand-wash recommended.Made from durable stainless steelFeatures an attractive, modern design that will fit most kitchen collectionsSide-pour spout keeps your kitchen mess-freeHand-wash recommended
